topic: 5. The number of people required for a software project is determined
options: after an estimate of the development effort is made.
by the size of the project budget.
from an assessment of the technical complexity of the system.
topic_cn: 5. 软件项目所需人数的确定依据是
options_cn: 在对开发工作量进行估算之后。
由项目预算的规模决定。
通过对系统技术复杂性的评估得出。
